content:
The string value contains embedded HTML tags. Note that all inputs should be escaped when rendered to HTML as a matter of course

escaped how?
you don't have to worry about that but I want to check something about it - where is this?

every search parameter in US Core:
For example

http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/US-Core-R4/branches/master/SearchParameter-us-core-allergyintolerance-clinical-status.html

source:

https://github.com/HL7/US-Core-R4/blob/master/source/resources/searchparameter-us-core-allergyintolerance-clinical-status.json
See the inferno tools for testing US Core: https://inferno.healthit.gov/inferno/
